snippet: Because Orb wowed Saturday, many of those who raced with him in the Derby will likely pass on the Preakness Stakes. As of now, only five other Derby starters are considering the Preakness.
abstract: Because Orb wowed Saturday, many of those who raced with him in the Derby will likely pass on the Preakness Stakes. As of now, only five other Derby starters are considering the Preakness.

headline.main: Taking Stock of the Emerging Preakness Field
